body.p:
Buffalo N.Y. May 27, 1865,
Secretary of State,
Frankfort, Ky.
Dear Sir,

Some years ago I was appointed Commissioner of Deeds for Kentucky; there being little to do in that office. I did not apply for a renewal of appointment at the end of the term; recently I have been applied to, frequently, to take acknowledgements for your state, and the relations of business between this State and Kentucky seem to promise much for the future; I would be glad to receive the appointment again from your Governor.
Enclosed I send $5, the fee I was changed under my former appointment. and if agreeable please send me a new appointment

I am Truly &c,
James S. Gibbs.

Comr Deeds
New York
Jas S. Gibbs
apptd
30th May 1865
